experience.description: Conducted primary research on the effectiveness of inquiry-based learning models in secondary STEM classrooms. Collected and analyzed qualitative data from pilot programs to evaluate student engagement and long-term retention of complex scientific concepts.

Developed and implemented lesson plans for 10th-grade Biology and 12th-grade Physics. Applied research findings to differentiated instruction strategies, resulting in a measurable increase in formative assessment scores across three class periods.

Collaborated on a study examining the impact of informal learning environments on high school students' career interests in technology. Synthesized findings into a report presented at a regional educational conference.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
